distance.face_closeup: extreme close-up with stretched perspective, unrealistic lens
distance.bust_portrait: bust-up portrait, shoulders visible, subject slightly turned away, natural angle
distance.half_body_focus: waist-up composition, hands partially visible, balanced framing
distance.cropped_forehead: headshot with forehead cropped, cinematic intensity
distance.over_the_shoulder: shoulder-back view, subject turning face toward camera
distance.cheek_focus: side angle close-up with focus on cheek and ear, cropped frame
distance.tiny_subject_far: distant shot, tiny subject, wide surreal background
distance.silhouette_far: silhouette in unnatural lighting, distorted horizon
distance.hole_view: scene viewed through a small hole or tunnel, warped edges
distance.infinity_depth: subject seen through an endless corridor or portal, exaggerated depth
distance.from_orbit: extremely distant perspective from space or high orbit

angle.angled_from_below: viewed from below with strong tilt, subject placed near frame edge
angle.angled_from_above: top-down angle with subject placed off-center, avoids symmetry
angle.window_peek_aside: angled view through a broken side window, subject offset and cropped
angle.fragmented_reflection: reflections in shattered mirror, subject asymmetric and offset
angle.tilted_asymmetry: severe Dutch angle with asymmetric framing, tension emphasis
angle.ceiling_flip_offset: ceiling becomes floor, subject positioned diagonally
angle.underwater_diagonal: angled underwater perspective, camera tilted, subject half-in frame
angle.from_side_corner: viewed from corner with sharp perspective line, subject in lower third

pose.jumping_diagonal: jumping midair at diagonal angle, limbs offset, subject cropped
pose.one_leg_pose_side: standing on one leg, viewed from side angle, slight off-balance
pose.glass_lie_offset: lying on transparent surface, face to the side, half-framed
pose.running_slanted: running motion along slanted ground, angled frame, off-center
pose.camera_selfie_side: taking selfie from tilted camera, not facing directly
pose.twist_diagonal: twisting body diagonally, motion trail along frame edge
pose.break_apart_side: body fragmenting toward left or right frame, non-radial
pose.levitating_sidehands: floating pose, hands extending off one side of frame
pose.wall_climb_angle: climbing diagonally across a wall, angle from below-left
pose.stretching_mid_frame: stretching motion mid-action, not facing front, cropped

composition.extreme_off_center: subject pushed to the extreme edge of the frame, strong negative space
composition.broken_mirror_fragment: subject shown through uneven mirror shards, overlapping layers, scattered
composition.top_corner_focus: main subject located in top left or right corner, sky dominant, asymmetric
composition.ground_peek: viewed from a crack in the ground, subject half-cropped above, asymmetrical
composition.offscreen_body: only part of body visible, most is cropped out in motion, avoids central framing
composition.asymmetrical_chaos: composition with no symmetry, elements scattered unevenly, avoids centering
composition.edge_tracking_motion: subject running across bottom frame edge, blurred, anti-center
composition.sky_floor_merge: horizon twisted, sky blends into floor, subject falling diagonally
composition.sliced_diagonal: scene cut across diagonally with light or shadow, subject floats across at edge
composition.corner_peek: subject emerging partially from frame corner, majority off-frame
composition.mid_action_pan: motion blur in horizontal pan, subject near far edge of image
composition.split_frame_dual: frame split vertically with two worlds, subject compressed to one side

focus.lens_flare_backlight: intense lens flare from unnatural light source
focus.tunnel_view: tunnel view into a mirror world
focus.foggy_mist: dense fog with colored lights and silhouette
focus.bokeh_inversion: background is sharp while subject is blurred
focus.time_trail: subject leaving motion trail like time echo
focus.fractured_blur: blurred view as if seen through shattered glass
